Development and execution of Greater Sacramento’s Bay Area Strategic Plan. Leading Greater Sacramento’s operation in Silicon Valley to further interconnect the Capital Region and Bay Area markets as a high-performing innovation and employment corridor within the Northern California Megaregion.

Promotion and development for initiatives between Arizona and Mexico that represented economic growth for both Mexico and the United States:•	Ongoing economic ecosystem modeling and research.•	Event management coordination.•	Community outreach and public service.•	Institutional social media management.•	Touristic promotion for Mexico.•	Cross-border FDI promotion.

Contribution	to the development of initiatives that positively impact the areas of affordable housing, education, and healthcare and create opportunities for growth within communities RDF serves through:	• Sourcing	resources and project opportunities in accordance to RDF´s mission, vision, and values.• Due Diligence and Documentation, Market Research and Testing for pilot project initiatives.	• Financial Data Analysis for special projects and core business.• Identifying Grant opportunities and Requests for Proposals, editing and proofreading Requests for  Funding and Application Submissions.• Elaborating business plans and PR materials for pilot project initiatives and special projects.• Feasibility Analysis and Strategic Planning for pilot project initiatives and special projects.• Client relationship management for pilot project initiatives and special projects. • Contributed to development for the following Special Project initiatives since inception:                 Small Businesses and Entrepreneurship:         - Pilot project proposal for a community-oriented small business and entrepreneurship    development center.         - Pilot equity investment model for Latino start-ups.                   EB-5 Foreign Investor Program:          - Due diligence, program research, feasibility analysis and development timeline to establish an EB-5 Regional Center.          - Initial pipeline for proposed Regional Center composed of potential investors, clients, partners, stakeholders, and specialized services professionals (consultants, attorneys, economists).          - Pilot EB-5 bridge lending model.         "Plaza de Las Culturas" mixed-use development for South Phoenix:          - Initial area research, market identification, feasibility analysis, and concept design.          - Print PR Materials and written communications.

I firmly believe Cynthia will be a great asset in whichever organization she chooses to develop her career bringing immediate value to her supervisor and peers.

summary: Bicultural and trilingual professional with 9 years of experience in Strategic Planning and Business Development across Mexico and the United States. Highly skilled in client relationship management, strategic engagement of investors, and managing pilot projects. Passionate about business innovation, client relationships, partnerships development, and contributing to social equality and reducing the educational attainment gap through professional activities.Born and raised in Monterrey, Mexico; has lived in Mexico City, La Rochelle, Boston, Phoenix, and is now proud and happy to call California home.
